patthana8.22:4.1: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:4.2: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:4.3: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.22:5.1: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:5.2: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:5.3: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.22:6.1: Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:6.2: Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:6.3: Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha … pe … adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
